title: 高级火箭的大气修改器 和 轨道激光炮
author: 狐star
txt_content:
修改轨道激光炮能否破坏下面方块的配置文件在哪里
大气修改器怎么用

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcmod.cn/item/168684.html 

/config/advRocketry/advancedRocketry.cfg 

中设置
    # If true the orbital laser will actually mine blocks on the planet below
    B:laserDrillPlanet=false
